data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Kanakia Distant, 1892 (Insecta: Hemiptera, Cicadoidea, Cicadidae) from New Caledonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Delorme, Quentin, Mille, Christian, Jourdan, Hervé (2016): A review of the genus Kanakia Distant, 1892 (Insecta: Hemiptera, Cicadoidea, Cicadidae) from New Caledonia. Zootaxa 4092 (3): 301-338, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4092.3.1
